name: NASCAR 2001
overview: This "2001" version of EA Sports' NASCAR is built on a new game engine, designed to produce improved environment mapping, real-time lighting effects, and realistic car physics. It is also the first NASCAR game to allow virtual drivers to race the quintessential Daytona 500. Over two dozen other ovals and road courses are available, as well, and the game features all 34 real-life drivers and teams from the most recent full season. Players can race through multiple seasons in the game, customizing their vehicles and building a reputation for precision driving at 200+ MPH. Stunning Damage Physics and Effects. Race at Daytona: For the first time, the world center of racing appears in a Nascar Playstation videogame. Race against the pact in the Daytona 500! Authentic Nascar Racing: The real drivers, cars, teams, tracks, sponsers, and rules. Top Drivers: Over 30 drivers including Jeff Gordon, Dale Earnhardt, Tony Stewart, Dale Jarrett, Bobby Labonte, Mark Martin, Dale Earnhardt Jr and Bobby Hamilton. More Tracks: Daytona and 13 other Nascar tracks with both day and night racing. Full or "Track Pack" Season: Race a full or half Nascar season or choose to compete on track packs: race just on short tracks, road courses, speedways or superspeedways.
